Bakersfield.KLHC: KLHC (1350 AM) is a multicultural radio station licensed to serve Bakersfield, California which broadcast a Punjabi format. 1350 AM simulcasts on KIID 1470 AM in Sacramento, KWRU 1300 AM in Fresno, & KOBO 1450 AM in Yuba City. Since 2005 Punjabi/Indian community has increased a lot in Bakersfield.Punjabi Americans are in Trucking and small business in big numbers.
